targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "metrics" WHERE ("service" = 'check_snmp_memory_ram' AND "performanceLabel" = '%user_real' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "value" FROM "metrics" WHERE ("service" = 'check_snmp_memory_swap' AND "performanceLabel" = '%used_swap') AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter
